message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really enjoy it! I'm offering it to you for $175. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $175 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

Hey Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product!  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140. This reflects the value of the product and gives us both a good deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I really think that's a fair price for this product.
